TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
granted, as more people use firefox, google is prompted to release a virus that destroy every computer that uses firefox which ruins the lives of millions of people worldwide

i wish that my computer was faster

(Do I have to grant this wish again?!) I strap it onto a rocket and blast it into orbit. That should be fast enough.

I wish I owned a submarine.

Granted. After you go under the water, its density suddenly increases to TWO THOUSAND that of water. You sink through the entire earth.

I wish I had a sub-everything that functions similarly to a submarine.

(W/ radar)

Granted. Because it is a sub everything, it's incredibly bad at being anything other than a tin can with radar that can kinda go underwater without combusting.

I wish flor the;p pte43

Not granted. Because i don't WANNA!

I wish for a faster Venusian dubstepbmobile with a fast computer.

Edited May 12, 2014 by Souper
MOAR EDITING LOLOLOL
It was all made out of antimatter.

..So? nothing happened. You lied! It wasn't antimatter!

I wish for mac N cheese.

Granted, you get a rain mac, a giant letter N and a piece of mouldering cheese.

I wish for a good idea for my next wish.

Granted but it gets horribly corrupted.

I wish for everyone to be vegan.

All the veggies are now made of Antimatter. Have fun!

I wish for an army!

Granted, it is made of antimatter.

I wish to get to finish high school.

Granted. Your diploma is made of antimatter. Have fun again!

I wish for a real Kerbin!

granted, it collides with the Earth

i wish that Titan (the moon) is habitable and has an advanced civilization (Victorian-esque industrial age) residing on it

Granted. But they die out due to a plague.

I wish to live with the stardroid Pluto.

Granted!

A kuiper belt object collides with pluto.

While this song plays:http://youtu.be/Vi35XQjFV_A?t=2m46s

I wish for a Flareon! (The furry pokemon that is my avatar)

Granted, it's get crushed by the remains of pluto since it has the worst stats ever.

I wish it wasn't so hot over here

Granted, now your suffering temperatures that are only one degree above absolute zero

i wish that Irrational games didn't dissolve (i love bioshock)

Granted. Meanwhile, some sailor comes along and nukes them.

I wish for ngheah squidward.

Granted. But the wishmaking fairy doesn't know what it is, so she summons the kraken (a giant squid) on your head instead.

I wish that the K-Drive worked on the Earth too.

Granted. The universe ends.

I wish for this wish to be corrupted.

Granted! The wish isn't corrupted!

I wish to be immortal

Granted. You are now a lobster.

I wish for a wish.
Granted! You don't get a wish
I wish you had remembered to make a wish.

Wish granted. I didn't remember

I wish for a sheep
